Bassett'], 'Producers': ['Don Carmody', 'Samuel Hadida'], 'Starring': ['Adelaide Clemens', 'Kit Harrington', 'Deborah Kara Unger']} Review Text: Its lacks the cutting edge the original had, lame plot and bad acting inthe main roles. I wouldnt recommend it unless you really like horror movies.. Review Title: Its lacks the cutting edge Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/07/02 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'Español', 'Português'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Pitof'], 'Producers': ['Denise Di Novi', 'Edward McDonnell'], 'Starring': ['Halle Berry', 'Halle Berry', 'Sharon Stone'], 'Studio': ['WARNER HOME VIDEO']} Review Text: The only reason I gave this two star is because it has Halle Berry in it wearing outfits that dont leave much to the imagination.

I've seen more realistic fight scenes in Disney cartoon. The plot could have been somewhat tolerable if they'd stuck to the Comics and not made it some teenage bubble gum movie.

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual displays a nuanced taste in media, characterized by a strong preference for films with compelling narratives and engaging plots. Despite appreciating high-quality production, their ratings reveal critical sentiments toward adaptations and sequels that fail to capture the essence of original works, particularly in the fantasy and horror genres. There’s a notable enjoyment of family-oriented content, evidenced by high ratings for fun films, while more violent or explicit content often elicits mixed reviews unless executed within a strong storyline.

Common themes include a critique of poor acting and lackluster plots, leading to varying quality expectations. Price sensitivity does not appear overtly significant, as high ratings persist irrespective of associated costs, indicating a willingness to invest in sought-after content. However, the lowest ratings lean towards productions that are perceived as subpar or overly commercialized, indicating a preference against mediocrity despite recognizable talent in cast or crew.

Core preferences reveal a balance between favoring diverse genres and valuing storytelling integrity. The consumer enjoys original, clever plots with depth, especially valuing intelligent humor and family-friendly narratives over mere star power or sensationalism. Their shopping behavior suggests a discerning viewer who prioritizes quality over quantity, gravitating toward productions that fulfill their narrative expectations rather than relying on familiar faces or brands.

target_interaction.title: Five Stars
target_interaction.text: There used to a reason for having Amazon prime. Now I have to buy it
description: Now in its 39th season, NOVA is the most-watched primetime science series on American television, reaching an average of five million viewers weekly.
target_interaction.subtitle: Season 8
